mapper.update: update group set captain_id = #{captainId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `minutes` = #{minutes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `days` = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_number = #{memberNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_private = #{isPrivate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE} where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select group_id, captain_id, group_name, tag, `minutes`, `days`, member_number, is_private, create_date from group where group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
